mdRecord.dcterms:title: Criminal Warrants, Justice of the Peace: Commonwealth vs William Bowers
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Commonwealth vs William Bowers Offense: Assault and Battery Victim and Complainant: Recorded in Floyd County Courthouse 06.22.1887 Guilty Cost: $4.76, Fine $5.00 This is a payment received on previous charge Satisfied in full 07.12.1887

Warrants (Law)
